title: External Fragment
description: External Fragments are fragments residing outside of AJO, which are exposed by CMS solutions like AEM, others.

xdm:origin.title: origin
xdm:origin.description: Source of truth of fragments (for example AEM, other potential CMS providers)

xdm:status.title: status
xdm:status.description: Status as maintained by the external CMS like AEM ( new, draft, published, modified, unpublished), etc

xdm:extRefId.title: external reference Id
xdm:extRefId.description: Id as referenced in the external system

xdm:sourceInfo.title: source Info
xdm:sourceInfo.description: Source access Information (can vary based on systems)

xdm:modelInfo.title: model Info
xdm:modelInfo.description: Model or schema on which the fragment is based
